statements.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIPPER_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`SID`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUTHISTORY ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIPPER_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MODIFYUSER` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ACTION` VARCHAR(200) NULL, `UPDATETIME` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUTHISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , SHIPPER_NUMBER_V , COMPACT_V , PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , ITEM_V , PRODUCT_V , ITEM2_V , PRODUCT2_V , ITEM3_V , PRODUCT3_V , HEAD_V , MANAGER_V , ATTN_V, '$USERID$', 'UPDATE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE SID = #SID#

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUTHISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , SHIPPER_NUMBER_V , COMPACT_V , PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , ITEM_V , PRODUCT_V , ITEM2_V , PRODUCT2_V , ITEM3_V , PRODUCT3_V , HEAD_V , MANAGER_V , ATTN_V, '$USERID$', 'DELETE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT(SID, AXTMODIFY, REPORTTITLE_V, REPORTNAME_V, CUSTOMERNAME_V, UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V, SHIPPER_NUMBER_V, COMPACT_V, PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V, QUOTATIONNO_V, ITEM_V, PRODUCT_V, ITEM2_V, PRODUCT2_V, ITEM3_V, PRODUCT3_V, HEAD_V, MANAGER_V, ATTN_V) VALUES(#SID#, #AXTMODIFY#, #REPORTTITLE_V#, #REPORTNAME_V#, #CUSTOMERNAME_V#, #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#, #SHIPPER_NUMBER_V#, #COMPACT_V#, #PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V#, #QUOTATIONNO_V#, #ITEM_V#, #PRODUCT_V#, #ITEM2_V#, #PRODUCT2_V#, #ITEM3_V#, #PRODUCT3_V#, #HEAD_V#, #MANAGER_V#, #ATTN_V#)
statements.statement:
Select * From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
CUSTOMERNAME_V like #CUSTOMERNAME_V#
UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V like #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#
SHIPPER_NUMBER_V like #SHIPPER_NUMBER_V#
COMPACT_V like #COMPACT_V#
PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V like #PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V#
QUOTATIONNO_V like #QUOTATIONNO_V#
ITEM_V like #ITEM_V#
PRODUCT_V like #PRODUCT_V#
ITEM2_V like #ITEM2_V#
PRODUCT2_V like #PRODUCT2_V#
ITEM3_V like #ITEM3_V#
PRODUCT3_V like #PRODUCT3_V#
HEAD_V like #HEAD_V#
MANAGER_V like #MANAGER_V#
ATTN_V like #ATTN_V#
LIMIT #START_V#, #LIMIT_V#
statements.update: UPDATE RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMSTATUS_ALERT SET WORK_EVENT_V = #WORK_EVENT_V#, STATUS_V = #STATUS_V# WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.statement:
Select COUNT(*) AS NUM From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
CUSTOMERNAME_V like #CUSTOMERNAME_V#
UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V like #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#
SHIPPER_NUMBER_V like #SHIPPER_NUMBER_V#
COMPACT_V like #COMPACT_V#
PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V like #PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V#
QUOTATIONNO_V like #QUOTATIONNO_V#
ITEM_V like #ITEM_V#
PRODUCT_V like #PRODUCT_V#
ITEM2_V like #ITEM2_V#
PRODUCT2_V like #PRODUCT2_V#
ITEM3_V like #ITEM3_V#
PRODUCT3_V like #PRODUCT3_V#
HEAD_V like #HEAD_V#
MANAGER_V like #MANAGER_V#
ATTN_V like #ATTN_V#
